They fit great and are very comfortable. I'm 6'3, 160 something lbs, and length-wise they're about midway between my knee and ankle. I got the US XXL. I'm giving them 4 stars for 2 reasons..  The first is just that they don't initially feel as soft as I was expecting. Perhaps after washing them they'll be softer and even more comfortable though. They feel fine, just not quite what I was expecting.  Second and main reason is the faux back pockets. There are slits in the back for pockets, but it's just sewn shut. There aren't actually back pockets. I really don't understand why someone would make the slits as if they were going to add back pockets, but then not actually add pockets.. I'm really tempted to cut the slits open and attempt to sew in my own back pockets lol.. This isn't a huge deal, but it seems so ridiculous to me that the slits are there, but the pockets aren't. If there were no slits, and I hadn't expected back pockets because it looks like it has them, then this wouldn't have bothered me as much. xD
These are great shorts until you wash them. The elastic is bursting through after my third time wearing them.

Great product. I have only one issue that’s not really an issue, but more of a wonder. I wonder why the pocket lining is synthetic material when the whole rest of it is cotton linen. I was hoping 100% of the pants would be cotton. It just feels weird putting my hands on the pockets when the rest of the fabric that touch my skin is the linen.

评论概述: These pants saved my life…sort of
评论详情: As I was drifting alone on the open sea after the shipwreck, I had almost lost faith. The sea was angry that day my friends. Ran out of the water, no food and sharks circling waiting for their meal. That’s when I realized it, the wind and these pants could make a great sail. As I removed them ever concerned about a shark attacking my manhood, I lifted the pants into the sky. After what seemed an eternity, the wind came…strong. The pants ballooned in the air like a majestic raven. Taking me to a small island by Thailand. It is here where I’ve just awoken in a bathtub full of ice, some really good painkillers a cell phone and my glorious pants. Oh, and my kidney is gone. Mondays, am I right?

评论概述: What happens to the back pockets I bought these just for them!!! No back pockets
评论详情: What up I paid you extra because you had back pockets this company is a scam they sell under over five different names with no quality control. I bought two pairs of black and they change it to blue lime I wouldn't tell the difference. The stitching is of the lowest quality ... They rip in less then a month. I like the concept bit they should coast less then a dollar for its absolute horrible quality

These pants are incredibly comfortable. Good value for the price. I wish the draw string was just a little longer. Other than that they are exactly what I expected. I liked them so much I bought a grey pair.
